    • Method Detail

      • startDynamoDb

        public static DockerContainerInstance startDynamoDb​(int port,
                                                    java.lang.String dockerNetworkName)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception

        Starts DynamoDb.

        This should not be called directly. It is available for OfficeFloor testing infrastructure to have consistent way to run DynamoDb.

        Parameters:
        port - Port to run DynamoDB on.
        dockerNetworkName - Optional docker network name. May be null.
        Returns:
        DockerContainerInstance for running DynamoDb.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If fails to start DynamoDb.
